properties.property: SELECT name AS 'table' FROM sqlite_master WHERE type='table' ORDER BY 1

SELECT m.name AS 'table', ci.cid AS ordinal, ci.name AS 'column', ci.type AS _type, ci.'notnull' AS _flag_null, ci.pk AS _flag_pk FROM sqlite_master m JOIN pragma_table_info(m.name) ci WHERE m.type = 'table' AND m.name NOT LIKE 'sqlite_%'
